articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun 
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun at 00:00 on Oct. 10 on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of the WPK together with members of the WPK Central Military Commission and NDC and staff members of the KPA Supreme Command to pay a high tribute to the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					 Seen standing before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and    Kim Jong Il was a floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Placed before them were a floral basket in the joint name of the WPK Central Committee and Central Military Commission, NDC, Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and Cabinet and a floral basket in the name of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces.
					
					 Kim Jong Un entered the hall where their portraits are displayed.
					
					 The head of the guard of honor of the ground, naval, air and anti-air forces of the KPA and the Worker-Peasant Red Guards made a salute towards the portraits.
					
					 He paid a high tribute to the portraits together with the participants.
					
					 He entered the hall where Generalissimo Kim Il Sung lies in state.
					
					 He paid homage to Kim Il Sung together with the participants in humblest reverence.
					
					 The participants included Choe Ryong Hae, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Jong Gak, Jang Song Thaek, Ri Yong Mu, Pak To Chun, Hyon Chol Hae, Kim Won Hong, O Kuk Ryol, Choe Pu Il, Kim Kyong Ok, Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Myong Sik, Yun Jong Rin, Pak Jong Chon and Kim Yong Chol.

articles.title: Senior Party and State Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Senior Party and State Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun 
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim and other senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party and officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions Wednesday visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay tribute to Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on the 67th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 Seen standing on both sides of the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il were the flags of the WPK and the DPRK and colors. Guards of honor of the ground, naval and air and anti-air forces of the Korean People's Army and the Worker-Peasant Red Guards lined up there. 
					
					 Seen placed before the portraits was a floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the KPA. 
					
					 Also before the portraits were floral baskets in the joint name of the Central Committee and Central Military Commission of the WPK, the NDC, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet of the DPRK, and in the name of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces.
					
					 The visitors made bows in reverence for the Generalissimos who achieved historic cause of founding the WPK, opened up the new history of the revolutionary party building in the era of independence and developed it into the invincible iron-willed party and mother party enjoying absolute support and trust from the popular masses and the guiding force of the Songun revolution.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Nigerian Government Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Nigerian Government Delegation
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with the Nigerian government delegation headed by Viola Onwuliri, minister of State for Foreign Affairs who paid a courtesy call on him, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday. 
					 The head of the delegation congratulated the Korean people on significantly greeting the 67th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 He said that during his stay in the DPRK he was deeply moved by the Korean people achieving great successes despite all difficulties in boundless reverence for their leader.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Expresses Condolences on Death of Algerian Ex-President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Expresses Condolences on Death of Algerian Ex-President
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of condolences to Algerian President Abdelaziz Bouteflika on Oct. 9 over the demise of Chadli Bendjedid, ex-president of Algeria, from chronic disease.
					 Kim in his message expressed profound condolences to the president of Algeria and, through him, to the government and people of the country and the bereaved family members.

articles.title: DPRK FM Denounces U.S. for Sparking New Missile Arms Race in Northeast Asia
articles.content:
DPRK FM Denounces U.S. for Sparking New Missile Arms Race in Northeast Asia 
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- A spokesman of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK Wednesday issued a statement denouncing the U.S. for opening the way for south Korea to develop missiles capable of reaching any part of the DPRK. 
					 The U.S. intention is to use south Korea, which regards the confrontation with the fellow countrymen as a means of its existence, as a shock brigade in implementing its hostile policy towards the DPRK and igniting a war against it, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 It is for this purpose that the U.S. discarded its mask of deterring the ballistic missiles proliferation and opted for improving the missile capability of south Korea in a bid to preempt an attack on the strategic armed forces of the DPRK. 
					
					 As was clarified by the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK, the Korean People's Army is keeping within the scope of strike not only the U.S. military bases in south Korea and its vicinity but also the U.S. mainland. 
					
					 So huge will be the consequences to be entailed by the U.S. missile development plan. It destroyed by itself the "missile technology control system" for preventing the worldwide proliferation of the ballistic missiles. It threw a wet blanket over the effort for restraint of long-range missile launch and all other efforts for stability of the Korean Peninsula and its surrounding areas, and destroyed the foundation for dialogue and negotiations. 
					
					 The U.S. is left with no moral qualifications to talk about the development of the DPRK's missile capability as it is the chieftain that sparked off new missile arms race in Northeast Asia. 
					
					 The U.S. has so far stepped up sanctions against the DPRK, calling for preventing its satellite launch for peaceful purposes while claiming that satellite also uses the ballistic missile technology. But, now it is in a position unable to make any excuses even though the DPRK launches a long-range missile for military purposes. 
					
					 It is natural for the DPRK to bolster missile capability for striking the stronghold of aggression under the condition that the U.S. intends to put forward south Korean puppet forces as a bullet-shield after deploying a great number of nukes and missiles targeted against the DPRK. 
					
					 The recent missile move will result in endangering the security of the U.S. mainland, far from ensuring it. The U.S. will have to hold full responsible for it.

articles.title: CPRK Denounces S. Korea's "Missile Policy Declaration"
articles.content:
CPRK Denounces S. Korea's "Missile Policy Declaration" 
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) Wednesday released a statement denouncing the "missile policy declaration" which the south Korean puppet regime made public in conspiracy with the U.S. on October 7. 
					 The statement said that the "missile policy declaration" is one of a preemptive attack on the DPRK and an open provocation to ignite an all-out war. 
					
					 The "missile policy declaration" which envisages the extension of missile range is the product of the heinous confrontation moves of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in south Korea to fight against the DPRK to the last and the U.S. aggression strategy for domination over the Asia-Pacific region, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The publication of the "missile policy declaration" shows that the preparations for a preemptive attack on the DPRK by the U.S. and south Korea have entered the phase of full-scale implementation. 
					
					 The DPRK is compelled to exercise strong physical strength, provided that the Lee group persists in the reckless moves for a war to prolong its dirty remaining days. 
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will annihilate the U.S. imperialist aggressors, sworn enemy of the Korean people, and the Lee group of traitors and achieve the final victory in the great war for country's reunification as was clarified in a statement of the spokesman for the DPRK National Defence Commission.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons and people across the DPRK visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il in boundless reverence for them in their residing areas on the 67th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Servicepersons, people from all walks of life and youth and schoolchildren in Pyongyang laid floral baskets, bouquets and flowers before the statues on Mansu Hill.
					
					 Seen there was a floral basket sent by Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Floral baskets, bouquets and flowers were placed before them in the name of the party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, organs, industrial establishments, farms and schools at all levels in Pyongyang, etc.
					
					 Floral baskets and bouquets were laid in the name of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and overseas Koreans staying in the homeland.
					
					 The visitors paid tribute to the peerlessly great men, recollecting their undying exploits with deep emotion.
					
					 Endless streams of people visited the statues at the Mansudae Art Studio, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of State Security and other places in Pyongyang.
					
					 Servicepersons, working people and youth and schoolchildren in other parts of the country also visited the statues of Kim Il Sung in their residential areas to pay high respect for him.

articles.title: Unhasu Orchestra Gives October Concert
articles.content:
Unhasu Orchestra Gives October Concert
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The Unhasu Orchestra gave October concert "You Are My Mother" at the People's Theater here Wednesday, the 67th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Enjoying the performance were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Ryong Hae, and other party, state and army senior officials and officials of party, army and power organs and social organizations and ministries and national institutions and men and officers of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and working people in the city.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the chief of Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and overseas Koreans.
					
					 The concert began with the playing of the patriotic song. Put on the stage were mixed chorus "Glory to Our Great Party", female vocal solo and pangchang "Fly High, Our Party Flag", mixed vocal trio "Let's Defend Socialism" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers highly praised the undying feats of great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in opening a new history of building a Juche-based revolutionary party and developing the WPK into a dignified and powerful party enjoying absolute support and trust from the people.
					
					 They represented through elegant melodies and rich volumes the spirit of the country which has won only victories under the leadership of the WPK.
					
					 They sang in high praises of the revolutionary spirit of all servicepersons and people ushering in the new era of the country's prosperity, remaining loyal to the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The performance was highly acclaimed by the audience.

articles.title: Concert Given by National Symphony Orchestra
articles.content:
Concert Given by National Symphony Orchestra 
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The National Symphony Orchestra gave a concert at the Moranbong Theatre here Wednesday to celebrate the 67th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 It was enjoyed by Choe Yong Rim and other party, state and army senior officials and the chairman of a friendly party and officials of the Cabinet, armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions and Pyongyangites.
					
					 Put on the stage of the concert were colorful numbers including serial symphony "Song Dedicated to Party," orchestral music of famous masterpiece "Nostalgia" and "Our General Is the Best". 
					
					 The performers highly praised the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, legendary great men, who founded the WPK and built it and strengthened the Party into an invincible powerful vanguard organization and a mother party enjoying absolute support and trust of the popular masses. 
					
					 They impressively represented the ever-victorious history of the WPK with melody of orchestra full of national flavor.
					
					 The concert displayed the steadfast will of the army and people of the DPRK to hold in high esteem Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il forever and invariably advance along the way of Songun revolution under the leadership of the party true to the idea and cause of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Korean People Owe All Their Achievements to WPK Leadership
articles.content:
Korean People Owe All Their Achievements to WPK Leadership
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The Korean people are greeting the 67th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on Wednesday.
					 The WPK enjoys their full support and trust as it steers the country to a rosy future.
					
					 The WPK was founded on October 10, 1945 by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Since its birth the WPK has wisely led the Korean revolution and construction, performing tremendous feats.
					
					 Under the guidance of the WPK, the people's government was successfully established in the country and its function and role have been steadily enhanced in keeping with the advance of the times to provide the popular masses with an independent and creative life.
					
					 After the liberation of Korea in August 1945, all democratic reforms including agrarian reform and nationalization of major industries were carried out smoothly.
					
					 In the April theses issued in 1955, the WPK set forth a policy of stepping up the socialist revolution on a full scale. As a result, the agricultural cooperativization was completed in a short period and the socialist transformation of private businessmen realized to provide an advanced socialist system in the country.
					
					 It also put forth a line of building an independent national economy and wisely led the work for its realization, thus turning the DPRK into a powerful socialist industrial state.
					
					 Meanwhile, the WPK has steadily built up the material and technological basis for the national defense industry after adopting a policy of simultaneously carrying on the economic and defense construction.
					
					 Even under the grim situation in which socialism was undergoing temporary setback and the imperialist allied forces were intensifying the moves to stifle the DPRK, the WPK reliably defended the country and socialism by dint of the Songun (military-first) policy and ushered in a new era of building a prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 And it provided the principles and landmark for Korea's reunification and encouraged all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad to the struggle of national reunification.
					
					 The WPK has strengthened the unity and solidarity with the progressive parties throughout the world in the idea of independence, peace and friendship, thus promoting the cause of independence against imperialism.
					
					 Under the seasoned guidance of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, the WPK is now leading the drive for building a socialist thriving country with invincible power.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held in DPRK
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students were held in all parts of the country Wednesday, the 67th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The plazas of the Party Founding Memorial Tower, the Arch of Triumph, the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium and all other venues were packed with youth and students who gathered with great pride and honor of having performed feats as members of the vanguard and shock brigade in accomplishing the Party's cause of building a thriving nation with peerlessly great men held in high esteem at the top posts of the WPK.
					
					 They danced to the tune of songs like "Glory to Our Great Party", "Let's Sing of Our Pride in Being under the Guidance of the General" and "The Party Is Embrace of the General" in boundless reverence for Generalissimo Kim Il Sung and with strong yearnings for Generalissimo Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Joy and excitement could be seen on the faces of the participants cheerfully dancing to the tune of songs including "Do Prosper, Era of the Workers' Party", "It Is October" and "Twelve Months for Songun Victory."
					
					 They showed the firm will of the Songun young vanguard to bring earlier the future of prosperity, true to the noble intention of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, enthusiastically dancing to the tune of such songs as "Young People, Let's Advance by Following the Party", "At One Go" and "Young People, Be Loyal to Our Party."
					
					 Similar dancing parties were held in seats of all provinces, cities and counties on the same day.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President 
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, Wednesday received a congratulatory message from Mahmoud Abbas, president of Palestine, chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization and chief of the Palestinian National Authority. 
					 In the message Mahmoud Abbas extended the sincerest congratulations to Kim Jong Un and, through him, to the dignified government and fraternal people of the DPRK in the name of the Palestinian people and on his own behalf, wishing the DPRK steady progress and prosperity.
					
					 He expressed deep thanks for sending full support to the legitimate struggle of the Palestinian people to put an end to foreign occupation and establish a sovereign state with East Kuds as its capital.
					
					 He wished Kim Jong Un happiness in good health, hoping that the historical and friendly relations of solidarity between the two countries and two peoples will grow stronger.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Lao President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Lao President
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a congratulatory message from Choummaly Sayasone, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and president of the Lao People's Democratic Republic, on October 9.
					 The president in the message said that he extended his warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un, the Central Committee of the WPK, all the party members and the fraternal people of the DPRK on behalf of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, all the party members and the people of Laos and on his own behalf on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 He said that the fraternal people of the DPRK achieved a great success in carrying out the cause of defending and building socialism and further improving the people's livelihood day by day guided by the Juche idea and Songun under the wise leadership of the WPK which was headed by President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il for the last 60 odd years and is being headed by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The WPK and government, all the servicepersons and people of the DPRK are waging the dynamic struggle to carry out the decision made at the 4th conference of the WPK, rallied close around Kim Jong Un in one mind.
					
					 He, availing himself of the auspicious opportunity, wished the WPK and the fraternal people of the DPRK new greater success in accomplishing the cause of protecting the country, building a thriving socialist country, achieving the peaceful reunification of the country and contributing to the regional and global peace and friendship and cooperation.
					
					 He hoped that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the parties, governments and peoples of Laos and the DPRK would grow stronger, wishing Kim Jong Un good health and happiness and great success in carrying out the noble cause.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Mongolian Party Leader
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Mongolian Party Leader
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, received a congratulatory message from the chairman of the Mongolian People's Party on Sept. 28.
					 The message extended sincere warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un and, through him, to all Korean people on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of the WPK on behalf of the Mongolian People's Party and its chairman.
					
					 It expressed belief that the cooperative relations between the two political parties which have played an important role in traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger in the future, too for the well-being of the two peoples.
					
					 Hoping that the traditional friendly relations between the two parties would further develop under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, the message wished him good health and happiness as well as success in his work.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Nigerian President
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Nigerian President 
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un was presented with a gift by Goodluck Ebele Jonathan, president of Nigeria. 
					 Viola Onwuliri, minister of State for Foreign Affairs who is leading the Nigerian government delegation on a visit to the DPRK, conveyed the gift to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, on Wednesday.

articles.title: Project for Improving Hapjang River in Pyongyang Completed
articles.content:
Project for Improving Hapjang River in Pyongyang Completed 
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The project for improving Hapjang River in the area of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun was completed on Oct. 9. The palace is where the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state for perpetuity.
					 The project began on Oct. 2.
					
					 The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, initiated the project and saw to it that servicepersons carried out the project in the offensive spirit of "at a breath" and with the invincible militant might.
					
					 The servicepersons removed over 280,000 cubic meters of mud and repaired floodgates, retaining wall and bridges by giving full play to the spirit of devotedly defending the leader, matchless devotion and popular heroism. They performed such a feat as completing the re-arrangement of the area covering hundreds of thousands of square meters in just six days.
					
					 The soldiers finished the mud-removing project at a dazzling speed, saying that they have no right to have a break before carrying out the order of the supreme commander.
					
					 The repairing of the floodgates and bridges were completed in 48 hours and the project for repairing the retaining wall and the one for arranging the area around the river were conducted at a high speed.
					
					 Officials and working people here joined the service persons in pushing forward the project.
					
					 Thanks to the sincere efforts exerted by the officials and working people, the inclined plane of dike of more than 250 000 square meters and the area around the river have been arranged. As a result, the appearance of the area around the river has changed beyond recognition.

articles.title: DPRK U-17 Women's Soccer Team Advances into Finals
articles.content:
DPRK U-17 Women's Soccer Team Advances into Finals 
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The DPRK team defeated its German rival 2:1 in the semifinals of the 2012 U-17 Women World Cup on Tuesday. 
					 The DPRK team will meet with its French rival in the finals on Oct. 13.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae 
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The visiting delegation of the China Institute of Contemporary International Relations headed by its President Cui Liru Wednesday visited Mangyongdae, birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Members of the delegation looked round historic relics there, being briefed on the impressive story associated with the old home in Mangyongdae. 
					
					 They toured revolutionary relics on Mangyong Hill. 
					
					 The head of the delegation said that it was honor to visit the old home in Mangyongdae on the significant day, the 67th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 President Kim Il Sung who embarked on the revolution in his early days victoriously led the great anti-Japanese war to liberate Korea, he said, and went on:
					
					 The President provided the traditional Sino-DPRK friendly relations with elder revolutionaries of China. 
					
					 I hope that the Korean people will achieve bigger successes in building a thriving socialist nation by inheriting the great revolutionary spirit of Mangyongdae family members. 
					
					 The delegation also visited the National Gifts Exhibition House, Pyongyang Folk Park and other places.

articles.title: Juche Idea, Great Idea Guiding Future of Mankind: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Juche Idea, Great Idea Guiding Future of Mankind: Rodong Sinmun 
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The Juche idea is the great idea guiding future of mankind, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a bylined article. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Juche idea was founded in reflection of the demand and aspiration of the independent era, new era of history in which the popular masses have become the master of their own destiny.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung clearly saw through the demand of the era of independence and created the Juche idea to develop the struggle for independence and socialism onto a higher stage and open up the era of independence, new era of history. 
					
					 From the first days of beginning the revolution until the last moments of his life Kim Il Sung conducted energetic and tireless ideological and theoretical activities. He authored many famous works giving full answers to the theoretical and practical problems in the revolution for national liberation from colony, the people's democratic revolution, socialist revolution and all other revolutions and accomplishing socialism and the cause of global independence, providing an encyclopedia for the revolution and construction and treasure house common to mankind to be conveyed down through generations. 
					
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il formulated the President's revolutionary idea as the integrated system of idea, theory and method of Juche and steadily developed and enriched it into the guiding idea of the independent era. 
					
					 The outstanding ideas and theories of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il guarantee the present era and eternal future of mankind for their width, depth and scientific accuracy. 
					
					 The Juche idea serves as the great idea guiding future of mankind as the world revolutionary people support the Juche idea and advance along the way indicated by the idea. 
					
					 The Juche idea has struck its roots deep into the hearts of the world progressive people and it is the recognized guiding idea representing the present era and all other historical eras of mankind.

articles.title: Papers Call for Glorifying WPK as Party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Papers Call for Glorifying WPK as Party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Papers Wednesday editorially call for developing the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) into the party of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il in the future, too and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche started on Mt. Paektu.
					 Nearly seven decades covered by the WPK have been a glorious history in which it has developed into the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 Since its foundation, the WPK has dynamically advanced, with the revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung, the Juche idea as its guidelines and with his august name and his absolute authority as the ever-victorious banner.
					
					 The history of Juche-based party building that originated from Mt. Paektu could greet new heyday in the era led by Kim Jong Il. His energetic leadership helped usher in a new era of modeling the whole party and society on Kimilsungism and put the party's organizing ability and unity on the highest level.
					
					 It is the great pride of the WPK that it firmly established monolithic ideological system and has maintained it even in the period when the revolution and construction have been put on a higher stage.
					
					 The WPK is shedding its brighter rays as the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as it is led by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Extraordinary political caliber, outstanding leadership ability and noble virtues of Kim Jong Un serve as a main source of consolidating the might of the WPK in every way and vigorously advancing the cause of building a thriving nation.
					
					 The paper calls on all the people to consolidate the invincible single-minded unity, the most precious gains of the party and revolution, as firm as a rock and invariably preserve the revolutionary line and principle of Juche which led them only along the road of victories.
					
					 Minju Joson says that the army and people of the DPRK advancing under the leadership of the great party will win victory after victory and surely build a thriving socialist nation of Juche on this land.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Romanian Political Party
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Romanian Political Party
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Hold Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as General Secretary of Our Party Forever and Successfully Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche" was posted on the Internet website Juche Idea by the Socialist Party of Romania on Oct. 3. 
					 The work, published on April 6, 2012, clarifies that it is the principled requirement for the victorious advance of the Korean revolution to hold General Secretary Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 It indicates the tasks to be fulfilled to steadily develop the WPK into a glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Mexico
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was brought out in pamphlet by the Publishing House of the Workers' Party of Mexico on Oct. 3. 
					 The work, made public on October 2, 1995, reviews with pride the glorious history of the WPK in which it explored a new way of building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It indicates the way to develop the WPK into an eternal party of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: WPK Anniversary Observed in Various Countries
articles.content:
WPK Anniversary Observed in Various Countries
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Various events took place in some countries on Oct. 3 to celebrate the 67th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They were a meeting, film show and photo exhibition in Laos, a seminar, film show and round table talks in Indonesia and a seminar, film show and book and photo exhibition in India.
					
					 Exhibited in the venues were works of peerlessly great men in the DPRK and books and photos introducing the DPRK.
					
					 Films shown were "Kimilsungia", "Korean People's Army, Steel-Strong Ranks" and other Korean films.
					
					 Personages of political parities and public organizations and the masses of relevant countries attended those events.
					
					 Vice-Chairman of the Central Committee of the National Construction Front of Laos Tong Yeu Tho, member of the C.C., of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and chairman of the Laos-Korea Friendship Association, said that the WPK achieved unbreakable unity and cohesion.
					
					 The powerful WPK and Songun Korea are unthinkable without the sagacious leadership of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The vice-chairman hoped that the dear respected Kim Jong Un would lead to victory the Korean people's drive for defending the country and building a thriving nation in good health.
					
					 Harinde Singh, secretary general of the National Leading Council of the Diversity Party of Indonesia, said the brilliant history of the WPK is associated with the immortal feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in party building.
					
					 At the seminar in India a message of greeting to Kim Jong Un was adopted.

articles.title: WPK Anniversary Marked by Bangladeshi Political Figures
articles.content:
WPK Anniversary Marked by Bangladeshi Political Figures 
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers’ Party of Bangladesh, and Hasanul Huq Inu, chairman of the Central Executive Committee of the Bangladesh National Socialist Party, made public a joint statement on Oct. 2 on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They extended warm congratulations to the dear respected Kim Jong Un and the ever-victorious WPK on the occasion.
					
					 The WPK has a glorious history in which it developed the DPRK into a socialist power--independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence--and led the socialist cause and human independence to victory despite ordeals, they said.
					
					 Today the WPK is invariably guiding the Korean revolution to victory under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, they noted, adding:
					
					 They are certain that the WPK, the army and people will register great achievements in their efforts for building a thriving nation and accomplishing independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as General Secretary of WPK Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as General Secretary of WPK Marked
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Lectures were given in Democratic Congo, Guinea and Tajikistan on Oct. 1 and 3 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 67th anniversary of the WPK.
					 Present there were personages of the Communist Party of the Democratic Congo, Kankan University of Guinea and the Communist Party of Tajikistan and the masses.
					
					 Otete Gaston Mboyo, deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Democratic Congo, said:
					
					 Peerless patriot President Kim Il Sung, father of the great Juche idea, founded the WPK, a genuine people's political body, on Oct. 10 in 1945 just after the liberation of Korea from the brigandish Japanese imperialists.
					
					 He developed the WPK into the popular party which firmly protects the interests of all Koreans and enjoys absolute support and trust, with insight into the importance of the position and role of the party in the revolutionary struggle.
					
					 October 8 this year marks the 15th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the WPK.
					
					 He built a socialist power with his original Songun politics.
					
					 In April the Korean people held Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the WPK and elected the dear respected Kim Jong Un as its first secretary.
					
					 The WPK is advancing towards the victory in the Juche cause under the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, as it is led by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kurbonzyon Mirzoyeva, member of the Presidium of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Tajikistan, said Kim Jong Il always settled all the problems arising in the revolution and construction by awakening people ideologically with firm conviction in their strength.

articles.title: October 4 Declaration Hailed by AAPSO
articles.content:
October 4 Declaration Hailed by AAPSO
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization (AAPSO) issued a statement on Oct. 3 on the occasion of the fifth anniversary of the October 4 declaration.
					 It said that the historic October 4 declaration serves as an action programme clarifying the ways for all the Koreans to achieve the national unity and reunification of the country.
					
					 The declaration includes realistic practical measures for improving the north-south relations based on the mutual respect and trust and reunifying the country through the process of ensuring the detente and peace on the Korean Peninsula by putting an end to the hostile military ties between the north and the south of Korea, the statement noted.
					
					 The tensions prevailing on the five islands in the West Sea of Korea and waters off the islands, in particular, make everyone feel the importance of the north-south agreement.
					
					 If the inter-Korean ties are to turn into those of reconciliation and cooperation and all Koreans to work toward the peace and prosperity, the north-south joint declarations should be respected, it noted.
					
					 The AAPSO expressed support and solidarity with the people of the DPRK in their just struggle for achieving independent and peaceful reunification of the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un rinde tributo a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Cuadros rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 10 de octubre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 67o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim y otros cuadros del partido y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo y los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, las organizaciones de masas, los ministerios y organos centrales visitaron este miercoles el Palacio del Sol de Kumsusan.
					En ambos lados de las imagenes con amplia sonrisa del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente          Kim Jong Il se veian las banderas del PTC y la RPDC y los estandartes y estaba alineada la guardia de honor de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas del EPC y del Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino
					
					Al pie de las imagenes estaba colocado el cesto de flores en nombre del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del PTC, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Ademas se veian un cesto de flores en nombre comun del Comite Central del PTC, la Comision Militar Central del PTC, el CDN de la RPDC, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros, de la RPDC, y el otro en nombre del Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares.
					
					Los visitantes rindieron el postumo homenaje al Presidente y al Dirigente quienes cumplieron la historica causa de fundacion del partido, abrieron la nueva historia de construccion del partido revolucionario de la epoca de independencia y fortalecieron el PTC como partido poderoso y organizacion maternal apoyada y confiada por las masas populares y en la orientadora de la revolucion del Songun.

articles.title: Cuadros rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
MINREX de RPDC denuncia a EE.UU. que fomenta carrera armamentista
Pyongyang, 10 de octubre (ACNC) -- En relacion con que Estados Unidos dejo abierto a los titeres del Sur de Corea el camino a desarrollar los misiles balisticos capaces de dar golpe a toda la extension de la parte Norte de Corea, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 10 una declaracion condenandolo.
					Tal intento de EE.UU. reside en movilizar a la guerra de agresion contra el Norte (de Corea) a los titeres surcoreanos, que consideran la confrontacion fratricida como metodo de existencia, tomandolos como brigada de choque para la ejecucion de su politica de hostilidad a la RPDC.
					
					Senala la nota y prosigue:
					
					Para este fin, EE.UU. se quito de tal mascara de que se esfuerza por la no proliferacion de misil balistico y tomo absurda opcion de dar golpe anticipado a las fuerzas armadas estrategicas de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea mediante la mejora de la capacidad de ataque de misiles de los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					Como ya han declarado las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de la RPDC, estas han colocado en la mira de su golpe certero las bases de las tropas norteamericanas desplegadas en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno y hasta el territorio norteamericano.
					
					Son muy serias las consecuencias que emanen de la enmienda de la orientacion sobre el misil de EE.UU. Ese pais norteamericano destruyo por si mismo el "sistema de control de la tecnologia de misil" para prevenir a escala internacional la proliferacion de misiles balisticos. Tambien derribo la base de dialogo y negociaciones al desalentar todos los esfuerzos por la estabilidad de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y la region, incluyendo el autocontrol de tiro de misil a largo alcance.
					
					Siendo el fautor que fomento nueva carrera armamentista de misil, EE.UU. perdio la calidad moral de hablar por mas tiempo del fortalecimiento de la capacidad de misil de la RPDC.
					
					Hasta la fecha, EE.UU. vino insistiendo obstinadamente en que debe suspender el lanzamiento de satelite con fines pacificos de la RPDC porque usara la tecnologia de misil balistico y armo el alboroto de sancion contra esta. Pero, desde ahora, EE.UU. no tiene ninguna calificacion de cuestionar hasta el lanzamiento de misil a largo alcance con fines militares. 
					
					Dado que el imperio, tras ubicar enorme cantidad de armas nucleares y misiles apuntados a la RPDC, trata de utilizar a los titeres surcoreanos como carne de canon, es sumamente justo el que la RPDC fortalece por todos los medios la capacidad de misil capaz de golpear el nido de la agresion.
					
					La presente enmienda de la orientacion sobre el misil no garantizara la seguridad del territorio estadounidense sino causara la consecuencia que haga mas peligrosa. Tal responsabilidad recaera enteramente sobre EE.UU.

articles.title: MINREX de RPDC denuncia a EE.UU. que fomenta carrera armamentista
articles.content:
CRPP critica la "politica de misil" de titeres surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 10 de octubre (ACNC) -- En relacion con que en contubernio con Estados Unidos, la banda de los traidores surcoreanos publico el dia 7 la "declaracion de la politica de misil", el Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria hizo publica el dia 10 una declaracion:
					La "declaracion de la politica de misil" es la de ataque preventivo anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y constituye abierta provocacion para desatar la guerra total, comienza la nota.
					
					Revela que el alargamiento del alcance de los misiles de los titeres surcoreanos es producto de la infame politica conflictiva de la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak, que quiere enfrentarse hasta el final con la RPDC, y de la agresiva estrategia de EE.UU. de dominar la region de Asia-Pacifico.
					
					La publicacion de esa declaracion demuestra que entran en la etapa crucial de accion los preparativos de ataque preventivo anti-RPDC que impulsaron el imperio y los titeres surcoreanos, denuncia.
					
					Como que la banda traidora, que se halla en agonia, recurre a la imprudente provocacion de guerra para mantener su sucia y precaria vida, la RPDC se ve obligada a usar su gran fuerza fisica, afirma.
					
					Como declaro el vocero del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC, el ejercito y pueblo coreanos exterminaran a los agresores yanquis, enemigos jurados del pueblo coreano, y a la banda del traidor Lee y culminaran la gran guerra por la reunificacion de la patria con la victoria final.

articles.title: CRPP critica la "politica de misil" de titeres surcoreanos
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias al presidente argelino
Pyongyang, 10 de octubre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 9 un mensaje de condolencias al presidente de la Republica Argelina Democratica y Popular, Abdelaziz Bouteflika, con motivo del deceso del ex presidente Chadli Bendjedid a causa de una larga enfermedad.
					El remitente expresa profundas condolencias al destinatario, y por su conducto, al gobierno, al pueblo y a los familiares del difunto.
